title: The Future of Fintech: Blockchain & Beyond
description: An in-depth look at how blockchain technology is disrupting traditional finance. We will cover cryptocurrencies, smart contracts, and the future of decentralized finance (DeFi) in Southeast Asia.
whatToExpect: Case studies of successful Malaysian Fintech startups
speakerInfo: Johan Razak, the Chief Technology Officer at LedgerMy holding a Bachelor of Computer Science (Fintech) from APU, specializing in secure digital transactions and smart contracts.

title: Mental Health Matters: Managing Exam Stress
description: A crucial seminar for students facing academic pressure. Learn coping mechanisms, breathing techniques, and how to maintain a healthy work-life balance during finals week.
speakerInfo: Dr. Amirah Syafiqah, a Clinical Psychologist holding a PhD in Psychology from Universiti Kebangsaan Malaysia (UKM), specializing in adolescent mental health and stress management.

title: Start-Up 101: From Idea to IPO
description: Do you have a million-dollar idea? This workshop guides students through the rigorous process of validating an idea, building a MVP, and pitching to investors.
whatToExpect: Pitch deck reviews by angel investors
speakerInfo: Sarah Chen, a serial entrepreneur holding a Bachelor of Business Administration from Sunway University, who successfully raised Series B funding for her startup GreenEats.

title: Code & Coffee: Python for Beginners
description: A relaxed, beginner-friendly coding session. Bring your laptop and learn the basics of Python automation while enjoying free premium coffee.
speakerInfo: Tan Wei Ming, a Senior Software Engineer at Grab holding a Bachelor of Software Engineering from Universiti Malaya, who is passionate about teaching coding fundamentals to non-CS students.

title: Sustainable Living: Zero Waste Campus
description: Join the green revolution! Learn practical steps to reduce your carbon footprint and help transition our university into a zero-waste campus.
speakerInfo: Elena Gomez, an Environmental Scientist holding a Bachelor of Environmental Science from Monash University Malaysia, who has led sustainability projects for NGOs across Southeast Asia.

title: AI in Healthcare: Saving Lives with Data
description: Discover how Artificial Intelligence is revolutionizing diagnostics, treatment plans, and patient care. Ideal for med-school and CS students alike.
whatToExpect: Panel discussion with doctors and data scientists
speakerInfo: Dr. K. Arumugam, a surgeon and AI researcher holding a Bachelor of Medicine, Bachelor of Surgery (MBBS) from Universiti Malaya, currently focusing on machine learning applications in oncology.

title: Photography Walk: Capturing Campus Life
description: Grab your camera or phone and join us for a guided photography walk. Learn about composition, lighting, and storytelling through lenses.
whatToExpect: Tips on editing with Lightroom Mobile
speakerInfo: Rizal Hisham, a freelance photojournalist holding a Bachelor of Photography & Creative Imaging from UiTM, whose work has been featured in National Geographic Asia.

title: Career Fair 2025: Connect & Hire
description: The biggest networking event of the year. Meet recruiters from top Fortune 500 companies and local unicorns looking for fresh graduates.
speakerInfo: Puan Siti Aminah, the HR Director at a Multinational Corporation holding a Bachelor of Human Resource Management from Universiti Utara Malaysia, accompanied by other industry leaders.

title: Mastering Public Speaking
description: Conquer your fear of the stage. This workshop focuses on body language, vocal projection, and structuring compelling speeches.
speakerInfo: Nancy Lee, a certified communication coach holding a Bachelor of Mass Communication from Taylor's University, who helps corporate executives refine their presentation skills.

title: Cybersecurity: Hacking 101 (Ethical)
description: Understand the mindset of a hacker to better defend systems. This controlled environment workshop covers basic penetration testing and defense.
speakerInfo: Jason Teoh, a certified ethical hacker holding a Bachelor of Information Technology (Information Security) from Tunku Abdul Rahman University of Management and Technology, currently consulting for banking institutions.

title: Digital Marketing for Beginners
description: Learn how to build a brand online. We cover SEO, social media marketing, and content creation strategies that actually convert.
speakerInfo: Fatima Zahra, a Digital Marketing Lead holding a Bachelor of Marketing from Universiti Putra Malaysia, who helped scale three local e-commerce brands to 7-figure revenues.

title: Robotics Showcase: The Next Gen
description: Witness the latest innovations from the engineering faculty. From autonomous drones to bipedal robots, see what the future holds.
speakerInfo: Prof. Dr. Siva Kumar, a leading researcher in robotics holding a PhD in Mechatronics Engineering from Universiti Teknologi Malaysia, specializing in automation systems.

title: Varsity E-Sports Championship Finals
description: Cheer for your faculty team as they battle it out in Dota 2 and Valorant. Big screens, loud cheers, and intense gameplay.
speakerInfo: Michael Wong, professionally known as 'Shoutcaster Mike', holding a Bachelor of Broadcasting from IACT College, who regularly commentates for regional E-sports tournaments.

title: Introduction to 3D Printing
description: Turn digital models into physical objects. Learn the basics of slicing software and printer maintenance.
speakerInfo: Kenji Tan, a final year student holding a Diploma in Product Design from The One Academy, currently working as the lead lab assistant at the university Maker Space.

title: Designing for Delight: Mastering UI/UX in the Digital Age
description: In today's fast-paced digital world, creating visually appealing designs is no longer enough - users expect intuitive, seamless, and delightful experiences. This event explores how thoughtful user interface (UI) and user experience (UX) design can elevate products.
whatToExpect: Keynote talks by experienced UI/UX professionals
Hands-on design challenges and live critiques
Tips on designing for accessibility, responsiveness, and engagement
speakerInfo: Ava Lim, a Lead Product Designer holding a Bachelor of Creative Multimedia from Limkokwing University, with over 10 years of experience crafting intuitive digital experiences for global tech start-ups.

title: Creative Writing Workshop
description: Unleash your inner author. This session explores narrative structures, character development, and overcoming writer's block.
speakerInfo: Lina Ramli, a published novelist holding a Bachelor of English Literature from Universiti Malaya, who also writes as a columnist for a leading daily newspaper.

title: DIY PC Building Workshop
description: Learn how to select parts and assemble your own custom gaming or workstation PC safely.
speakerInfo: Ahmad Faiz, a Tech Club Committee Member holding a Bachelor of Computer Engineering from Universiti Teknologi Malaysia, with a passion for custom hardware modification.

title: Investment 101: Stocks & Bonds
description: Stop saving, start investing. Learn the fundamentals of the stock market, risk management, and how to read financial statements.
speakerInfo: Mr. Chan Wei Ming, a Chartered Financial Analyst (CFA) holding a Bachelor of Finance from Nottingham University Malaysia, with over 20 years of stock market experience.

title: Yoga for Beginners
description: A rejuvenating session to stretch your body and calm your mind. Suitable for all fitness levels.
speakerInfo: Priya Singh, a certified Yoga Alliance Instructor holding a Bachelor of Sports Science from Universiti Malaya, dedicated to promoting holistic wellness.

title: Table Tennis Championship
description: Fast-paced ping pong action. Who will be the university champion?
speakerInfo: Jason Ng, the Table Tennis Club Secretary holding a Bachelor of Economics from Universiti Malaya, who organizes annual inter-faculty sports competitions.

title: End of Semester Music Night
description: Celebrate the end of exams with live performances by student bands and acoustic acts.
speakerInfo: The Campus Vibes, a student band comprising final year students holding a Bachelor of Music from UCSI University, known for their energetic pop-rock covers.

title: Introduction to Python for Data Science
description: A hands-on workshop designed for beginners to learn the basics of Python programming with a focus on data analysis libraries like Pandas and NumPy.
speakerInfo: Dr. Aiman Razak, a Senior Lecturer holding a PhD in Computer Science from Universiti Kebangsaan Malaysia, specializing in data mining and artificial intelligence.

title: Public Speaking Mastery: Voice & Confidence
description: Unlock your potential as a speaker by learning techniques to project your voice, manage stage fright, and structure compelling speeches.
speakerInfo: Ms. Sarah Lee, a Toastmasters District Champion holding a Bachelor of Corporate Communication from Universiti Putra Malaysia, who coaches students on effective public speaking.

title: Sustainable Engineering: Building for the Future
description: An insightful seminar exploring green building materials, renewable energy integration, and the future of eco-friendly infrastructure.
whatToExpect: Q&A session on career paths in sustainability
speakerInfo: Ir. Tan Wei Ming, a Green Building Index (GBI) Facilitator holding a Bachelor of Civil Engineering from Universiti Teknologi Malaysia, advocating for sustainable construction practices.

title: Financial Literacy 101 for Students
description: Learn how to manage your student budget, understanding loans, and basic investment strategies to secure your financial future early.
whatToExpect: Tips on saving money as a student
speakerInfo: Mr. Johan Ariff, a Certified Financial Planner (CFP) holding a Bachelor of Finance from Universiti Utara Malaysia, passionate about improving financial literacy among youths.

title: Adobe Illustrator Workshop: Logo Design
description: Dive into the world of vector graphics and learn how to create professional logos and branding materials using Adobe Illustrator.
venue: Multimedia Studio, Faculty of Creative Arts
speakerInfo: Emily Wong, a freelance Graphic Designer holding a Bachelor of Graphic Design from Taylor's University, specializing in brand identity and vector illustration.

title: Data Science: The Sexiest Job of the 21st Century
description: What exactly do data scientists do? We deconstruct the hype and look at real-world applications of Big Data.
speakerInfo: Dr. Farhan Adnan, a Data Science Lecturer holding a PhD in Data Analytics from Universiti Teknologi PETRONAS, who consults for retail companies on customer behavior analysis.

title: Film Screening: 'The Last Borneo'
description: A documentary screening followed by a discussion on conservation efforts in East Malaysia.
speakerInfo: Mark Lee, an independent filmmaker holding a Bachelor of Cinematic Arts from Multimedia University (MMU), focusing on documentaries regarding environmental issues in Borneo.

title: Valentine's Baking Workshop
description: Learn to bake cupcakes and cookies for your loved ones (or yourself!). All ingredients provided.
speakerInfo: Chef Rosnah, a professional pastry instructor holding a Diploma in Culinary Arts from KDU University College, known for her intricate wedding cake designs.

title: Love & Relationships Panel
description: An open forum discussing modern relationships, communication standards, and red flags.
speakerInfo: Mr. Davin Raj, a licensed counselor holding a Master of Counseling from Universiti Sains Malaysia, currently serving at the University Counseling Unit.

title: Single & Mingling Mixer
description: A fun, low-pressure social event for students to meet new friends from different faculties.
speakerInfo: Alicia Teoh, the Student Council Social Director holding a Bachelor of Event Management from Sunway University, organizing events to foster campus community spirit.

title: Augmented Reality (AR) Workshop
description: Create your first AR filter for Instagram and TikTok using Spark AR Studio.
speakerInfo: Jenny Ko, a freelance AR creator holding a Bachelor of Multimedia Design from The One Academy, with over 50 million impressions on her Instagram filters.

title: Resume Rescue Clinic
description: Is your resume getting rejected? Bring a printed copy and get 1-on-1 feedback to make it ATS-friendly and impactful.
speakerInfo: Ms. Geetha, a Career Counselor holding a Bachelor of Psychology from HELP University, specializing in graduate employability and interview coaching.

title: Debate Club Showcase
description: Watch the university's best debaters tackle the motion: 'This House Believes AI will do more harm than good'.
speakerInfo: Syed Azmi, the Varsity Debate Captain holding a Bachelor of Laws (LLB) from Universiti Malaya, who was a finalist in the National Varsities Debate Championship.

title: Effective Leadership Seminar
description: Leadership isn't just about giving orders. Learn empathy, delegation, and strategic vision.
speakerInfo: Datuk Azman, the CEO of Synergy Corp holding a Master of Business Administration (MBA) from Universiti Kebangsaan Malaysia, returning to his alma mater to mentor future leaders.

title: Introduction to Astronomy
description: Explore the cosmos. We will be setting up telescopes to view Saturn's rings and the Moon's craters.
speakerInfo: Prof. Dr. Tan, an Astrophysics Lecturer holding a PhD in Physics from Universiti Sains Malaysia, who also serves as the advisor for the University Astronomy Club.

title: Music Production: Making Beats
description: Learn the basics of FL Studio and Logic Pro. How to mix, master, and produce a track from your bedroom.
speakerInfo: Zack Ariffin, professional DJ holding a Bachelor of Audio Engineering from SAE Institute, representing the new wave of local electronic music producers.

title: Foreign Language Taster: Japanese
description: Konnichiwa! A fun introduction to the Japanese language and culture. Learn basic greetings and writing hiragana.
speakerInfo: Sensei Yumi Tan, a Japanese language instructor holding a Bachelor of Linguistics from University of Tsukuba, with 15 years of experience teaching Japanese in Malaysia.

title: Foreign Language Taster: French
description: Bonjour! Dip your toes into the language of love. We cover pronunciation and basic travel phrases.
speakerInfo: Madam Sophie Lim, a fluent French speaker holding a Bachelor of French Language Studies from Universiti Putra Malaysia, specializing in conversational French for beginners.

title: Volunteer Briefing: Animal Shelter
description: We are organizing a visit to the local animal shelter. Attend this briefing to learn safety protocols and how you can help.
speakerInfo: Raj Kumar, the Community Service Society President holding a Bachelor of Social Science from Universiti Sains Malaysia, dedicated to animal welfare and community outreach.

title: Chess Tournament
description: A rapid chess tournament for all skill levels. Prizes for the top 3 players.
speakerInfo: Steven Low, the University Chess Club President holding a Bachelor of Mathematics from Universiti Malaya, who is a national-level chess arbiter.

title: Excel for Internships
description: Don't go into your internship unprepared. Master VLOOKUP, Pivot Tables, and Macros to impress your boss.
speakerInfo: Mr. Lim Kian Seng, a corporate trainer holding a Bachelor of Business Information Systems from TAR UMT, specializing in productivity software for corporate environments.

title: Calligraphy & Hand Lettering
description: The art of beautiful writing. A relaxing workshop teaching brush pen calligraphy.
speakerInfo: Anna Liew, a freelance illustrator holding a Bachelor of Fine Arts from the Malaysian Institute of Art, specializing in modern brush lettering and watercolor.

title: Understanding Tax in Malaysia
description: Adulting is hard. We explain LHDN, e-Filing, and tax reliefs so you don't get in trouble with the government later.
whatToExpect: How to register a tax file
speakerInfo: Puan Norazlina, a Senior Officer from the Inland Revenue Board (LHDN) holding a Bachelor of Accounting from UiTM, dedicated to educating students on tax compliance.

title: Intro to Game Development with Unity
description: Ever wanted to build your own video game? Start here with the Unity engine.
speakerInfo: Alex Tan, an Indie Game Developer holding a Bachelor of Game Development from KDU University College, with multiple titles published on the Steam platform.

title: Mobile App Dev: Flutter vs React Native
description: A technical showdown. Which framework should you learn in 2026? We compare performance and developer experience.
speakerInfo: Ravi Muthusamy, a Senior Mobile Engineer at Shopee holding a Bachelor of Software Engineering from Universiti Malaya, with expertise in cross-platform mobile architecture.

title: Badminton Friendly Match
description: Join us for a casual badminton session. Rackets and shuttles provided.
speakerInfo: Lee Wei Ming, the Badminton Club Vice-President holding a Bachelor of Sports Management from Universiti Malaya, organizing community sports events for students.

title: Psychology of Color in Marketing
description: Why is Facebook blue and McDonald's red? Learn how color influences consumer behavior.
speakerInfo: Dr. Melissa Harris, a Lecturer in Consumer Psychology holding a PhD in Marketing from Universiti Putra Malaysia, researching visual branding and consumer perception.

title: First Aid & CPR Certification
description: Learn life-saving skills. This is a condensed workshop covering the essentials of emergency response.
speakerInfo: John Pillai, a certified paramedic holding a Bachelor of Nursing from International Medical University (IMU), representing St. John Ambulance Malaysia.

title: Speed Networking for Introverts
description: Networking doesn't have to be scary. Structured, short interactions to help you build connections without the awkwardness.
speakerInfo: Sarah Abdullah, a Career Development Officer holding a Bachelor of Human Resource Development from Universiti Teknologi Malaysia, focused on helping students build soft skills.

title: IoT: Building Smart Home Devices
description: Introduction to Internet of Things using Arduino and Raspberry Pi.
speakerInfo: Tan Yi Shen, the Tech Club Engineering Lead holding a Bachelor of Electrical & Electronic Engineering from Tenaga Nasional University (UNITEN), specializing in embedded systems.

title: Futsal Tournament Qualifiers
description: The road to the championship starts here. 5-a-side matches.
speakerInfo: Coach Rahim, a University Sports Officer holding a Bachelor of Sports Science from UiTM, who manages the university's varsity football team.

title: Contemporary Dance Workshop
description: Express yourself through movement. No prior dance experience required.
speakerInfo: Sarah Jenna, the Lead Choreographer of the University Dance Crew holding a Bachelor of Performing Arts (Dance) from Universiti Malaya, specializing in contemporary and modern dance.

title: Thesis Writing Bootcamp
description: For final year students. We shut the doors and write. Mentors available for consultation.
speakerInfo: Dr. Wong, a Senior Lecturer holding a PhD in Education from Universiti Malaya, who coordinates the Academic Writing Support program for postgraduate students.

title: Intro to Cloud Computing (AWS)
description: Why move to the cloud? Learn the basics of Amazon Web Services.
speakerInfo: Kumar Velu, a Certified AWS Cloud Practitioner holding a Bachelor of Information Technology from Multimedia University (MMU), specializing in cloud infrastructure migration.
